name: Kickback
description:
Kickback is a Platforming First-Person Shooter where the player's movement is out of their control!

Your only means of traversing the landscape is by utilizing the backblast from your range of weapons. But beware! Throughout your journey, evil robots seek to stop you in your tracks.

Can you blast your way through 6 INTENSE levels of ACTION?!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020,

Made by Baz Lever, and Conor1NDesign

Gunshot sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
Music provided by Syndicate Audio, used with permission
